name: Heli Fight Seawar
description:
Heli Fight Seawar!!!
Game includes very real effect of shooting game with elite shooter commando and gatling gun animation, bullet particle coming out of the gun and hitting the fury sniper and rifle commando also be careful with the missile launcher enemy all they have real animation and real killing skill, so be aware and make your way clear as soon as possible and kill them before they even know about your presence on the apache helicopter with dual killing machine gun for the grand battle in the sea. realistic enemy animation for killing and shooting rocket and shooting shot guns.
Features
- Highly realistic gunship helicopter games 3d free fly
- Brilliant air land combat sea submarine war, spread over 4 war game levels
- Detailed pilot ranking system with submarine war mission rewards
- Elite weaponry and combat survival skills are required
